StringListProperty.Name: HelpIdMappingRules
StringListProperty.Description: Defines the mapping rules from C/C++ resource IDs to help resource IDs. Format: IDx_,HIDx_,<offset> with HIDx_ = IDx_ + <offset>

StringListProperty.Name: ResourceHeaderFiles
StringListProperty.Description: Defines the pathes of the C/C++ header files (.h) containing the C/C++ resource IDs that will be mapped to help resource IDs.

StringProperty.Name: SynonymTopicsFile
StringProperty.Description: Defines the path of the help topic synonyms file.

StringProperty.Name: IgnoreTopicsFile
StringProperty.Description: Defines the path of the help topics to ignore file.
